"Meow! Let's All Fight Together!":
"Meow!
Do you know about fighting together?
When ARKS meet in battle, they watch
each others's backs.
It always looks so cool when that happens.
Toro wants to try fighting together
with <%me>! Meow!
*Successfully unite with Toro and Kuro
in \"Atrocious Ocean\". You cannot bring
them with you at the start of the quest."
